resources.string: A fortress of glass that houses a stronger network than any spider\'s web.

To be light in darknes... To bring smiles on faces... To be the cause of a blessing:
GK is no longer General Knowledge but Global Knowledge... A problem you will love solving:
57 sleepless nights, where London crawled down to hell and there stood the germans praising their Mysterious \"Lightning War\"
No bounds to your destination... No limits to speed... Go around the world on:
\"REVOLUTION DE L\'ART\" \n Get addicted to the world of art... The word is in town.
Explore the unexplored.\nTake your safety glasses off and quiz away:
This pervy structure watches children flux their muscles and play. With a bowl of breakfast beside, the structure stands tall and mighty, flawless except for a circular crack on its front end.
